Package de.gnwi.spicesviewer

Spices Viewer:
This application validates and displays an entered SPICES line notation using the GraphStream dynamic graph library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditionalSettingsDialog
    A JDialog extending class to change settings of the application that can not be set in the MenuBar, such as node and edge weight and the node size.
    AlternativeViewerPanel
    A JPanel extending object to display the graph as in the ViewerPanel but giving the user an alternative zoom experience by using a JScrollPane.
    Constants
    The non language-related constants for the Spices Viewer application.
    Controller
    The Spices Viewer application's controller.
    HTMLToolTip
    An abstract library that provides a method to create html formatted Strings for tool tips with a predefined width (see Constants.TOOL_TIP_WIDTH).
    ImageExportFileSinkImagesWorker
    A SwingWorker extending class to export the graph by GraphStream's FileSinkImages as an image file.
    ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker
    A SwingWorker extending class to export the graph as an image file by adding a 'ui.screenshot' attribute to it that the GraphStream Viewer intercepts causing it to export the graph (the visible section if it has been dragged and/or zoomed)
    Language
    An abstract library to read a 'Language_xx.properties' file containing the language-dependent constants of the application.
    Main
    The Spices Viewer application's main class.
    MainFrame
    The Spices Viewer application's main frame consisting of a JTabbedPane (that holds the ViewerPanel, the AlternativeViewerPanel, the StructureLibraryPanel) and a JPanel that serves as a status bar.
    MenuBar
    A JMenuBar for the application's MainFrame.
    ShowStatusMessageWorker
    A SwingWorker extending class to present a status message in the MainFrame's status bar for a defined amount of time.
    StructureLibraryPanel
    A JPanel to present the user some exemplary SPICES structures (loaded from a 'Structure.properties' file) that can be displayed in the ViewerPanel.
    StructurePropertiesReader
    An abstract library to read a 'Structures.properties' file containing some exemplary SPICES structures and to load them into the Spices Viewer application.
    UserPreferences
    A serializable class that preserves application and graph settings made by the user for the next start of the application.
    ViewerPanel
    A JPanel extending class where the user can enter a SPICES line notation into a text area that will be displayed in a GraphStream ViewPanel underneath the text area.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Constants.AddStructureOptions
    An enum for the different modes of adding a structure from the library to the ViewerPanel's JTextArea that holds their language-dependent representations.
    Constants.ImageExportOptions
    An enum for the four different modes of exporting the graph or the whole main frame that holds their language-dependent representations.
    Constants.Shape
    An enum for the GraphStream node shape options (see StyleConstants.Shape) that combines the language-dependent representation of each option with the keyword that must be added as an 'ui.style' attribute to a node.

Package de.gnwi.spicesviewer Description

Spices Viewer:
This application validates and displays an entered SPICES line notation using the GraphStream dynamic graph library. Additional functionalities include several screenshot options for the graph, settings for the display of the graph (such as node color, node size and node shape) and displaying some exemplary SPICES structures from a given file. The GUI components were created using the java Swing library.

1) SPICES (Simplified Particle Input ConnEction Specification) Viewer
